#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t, n, a, ans;
    for(scanf("%d", &t);t--;)
    {
        scanf("%d", &n);
        ans = 0;
        for(int i = 0;i < n;++i)
            scanf("%d", &a), ans = max(ans, a);
        printf("%d\n", ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
